133  ScopedCallback(const ScopedCallback& other)
134  :
135  m_ref_counter(other.m_ref_counter),
136  m_interface (other.m_interface),
137  m_id (other.m_id)
138  {
139  // increment the reference counter
140  ++m_ref_counter->count;
141  }
142 
143  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
144  // OPERATORS
145  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
146 
147  // delete the assignment operators
148  ScopedCallback& operator=(const ScopedCallback& other) = delete;
149 
150  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
151  // DESTRUCTOR
152  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
153 
154  ~ScopedCallback()
155  {
156  // reference counter should be non-zero
157  assert(m_ref_counter->count > 0);
158 
159  // decrement the reference counter and check if this is the last
160  // reference
161  if (--m_ref_counter->count == 0)
162  {
163  // does the callback need unregistering?
164  if (!m_ref_counter->early_unregister)
165  {
166  m_interface->unregister_function(m_id);
167  }
168  // clean up the reference counter
169  delete m_ref_counter;
170  }
171  }
172 
173  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
174  // PUBLIC MEMBER FUNCTIONS
175  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
176 
180  chaos::uint32 get_id() const
181  {
182  return m_id;
183  }
184 
194  void unregister()
195  {
196  // there should be at least one instance!!
197  assert(m_ref_counter->count > 0);
198  // do nothing if the callback is already unregistered
199  if (!m_ref_counter->early_unregister)
200  {
201  m_interface->unregister_function(m_id);
202  m_ref_counter->early_unregister = true;
203  }
204  }
205 
206 private:
207 
208  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
209  // PRIVATE ATTRIBUTES
210  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
211

219  CallbackInterfaceBase* m_interface;
223  chaos::uint32 m_id;
224 };

370  ScopedCallback register_function(
371  void (*callback_function)(function_parameters...))
372  {
373  // increment the global callback id and use it as this callback id
374  chaos::uint32 id = m_next_id++;
375  // this callback shouldn't be registered
376  assert(m_callback_funcs.find(id) == m_callback_funcs.end());
377  assert(m_scope_refs.find(id) == m_scope_refs.end());
378 
379  // store this function mapped under the id
380  CallbackData f;
381  f.owner = NULL;
382  f.function.standard = callback_function;
383  m_callback_funcs[id] = f;
384 
385  // create a scoped callback, store it's reference counter and return
386  CallbackReferenceCounter* ref_counter = nullptr;
387  ScopedCallback callback(this, id, ref_counter);
388  m_scope_refs[id] = ref_counter;
389  return callback;
390  }

408  template<typename owner_type,
409  void (owner_type::*function_type)(function_parameters...)>
410  ScopedCallback register_member_function(owner_type* owner)
411  {
412  // increment the global callback id and use it as this callback id
413  chaos::uint32 id = m_next_id++;
414  // this callback shouldn't be registered
415  assert(m_callback_funcs.find(id) == m_callback_funcs.end());
416  assert(m_scope_refs.find(id) == m_scope_refs.end());
417 
418  // store this function mapped under the id
419  CallbackData f;
420  f.owner = owner;
421  f.function.member = member_wrapper<owner_type, function_type>;
422  m_callback_funcs[id] = f;

425  CallbackReferenceCounter* ref_counter = nullptr;

491  virtual void unregister_function(chaos::uint32 id)
492  {
493  // ensure the id is associated with this interface
494  assert(m_callback_funcs.find(id) != m_callback_funcs.end());
495  assert(m_scope_refs.find(id) != m_scope_refs.end());
496 
497  // remove the id and function from the mappings
498  m_callback_funcs.erase(id);
499  m_scope_refs.erase(id);
500  }

508  void trigger(function_parameters... params)
509  {
510  // iterate over the attached functions and call them
511  CHAOS_FOR_EACH(it, m_callback_funcs)
512  {
513  // member function?
514  if (it->second.owner != NULL)
515  {
516  it->second.function.member(it->second.owner, params...);
517  }
518  // standard function
519  else
520  {
521  it->second.function.standard(params...);
522  }
523  }
524  }
